original_title: Cinexpérimentaux #6: Marcel Hanoun, A Lesson in Cinema
overview: Marcel Hanoun, one of the most innovative of filmmakers, gives us what he names "a lesson in cinema." Frederique Devaux and Michel Amarger filmed this piece at his country house, composing an abundantly rich portrait. Film clips and sparks of theoretic bravura testify to the feverish creativity and the drunken agitation behind which lurks the ever-composed voice of the filmmaker.
title: Cinexpérimentaux #6: Marcel Hanoun, A Lesson in Cinema
